languages.text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.
languages.original_text: Перезаряжает все макропушки, которые стреляли во время фазы Ускорения. Восстановление: случайное, 1–3 раунда. ! Можно использовать только во время фазы Завершения

traits.locale_text: Reloads all macro-cannons that were fired during the acceleration phase. Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.
Reloads all macro-cannons that were fired during the acceleration phase. Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

languages.text: Перезаряжает все {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g}, которые стреляли во время {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазы ускорения{/g}. Восстановление: случайное, (от 1 до 3) раундов. ! Можно использовать только во время фазы завершения

Lädt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} nach, die während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} abgefeuert wurden. Abklingzeit: (1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der Endphase verwendet werden.
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Lädt{/g} alle {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} nach, die während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} abgefeuert wurden. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der Endphase verwendet werden.

languages.text: Recharge tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} mis à feu lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}. Temps de recharge : (de 1 à 3) rounds (aléatoire). ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la phase finale.
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recharge{/g} tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} mis à feu lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire). ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la phase finale.

languages.text: 立刻装填所有在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}发射过的{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！只能在结束阶段中使用。
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: 立刻装填所有在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}发射过的{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！只能在结束阶段中使用。

languages.text: Recarga todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} disparados durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}. Tiempo de recuperación: (de 1 a 3) asaltos aleatoriamente. ! Solo se puede usar durante la fase final.
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recarga{/g} todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} disparados durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio. ! Solo se puede usar durante la fase final.

languages.text: 加速フェーズ中に発射された{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}をすべてリロードする。 クールダウン：ランダムで1～3ラウンド。 ！最終フェーズ中にのみ使用可能
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} that were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中に発射されたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム） ！加速フェーズ中にのみ使用可能。
